description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 2 iterations of function f(x) = 9x + 8.
comments: n, 9*n+8 and 81*n+80 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..100000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(9*n+8) and IsPrime(81*n+80)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
